page.title: 02FARMING AT BROUGHTON
page.content: BROUGHTON IS WHOLLY AGRICULTURAL, COMPRISING ONE LARGE ESTATE AND 10 OTHER FARMS. THE 10 HAVE A TOTAL ACREAGE OF 2111,MADE UP OF 96 ACRES WOODLAND, 13 ACRES OF LARGE POOLS AND 2012 ACRES OF CEREALS AND GRASSLAND. FOUR OF THE FARMS ARE CHIEFLY DAIRY, WITH SOME BEEF AND ARABLE, THREE ARE BEEF ENTERPRISES AND THREE ARE ARABLE. THE 10 FARMS HAVE 17 FULL TIME EMPLOYEES, TOGETHER WITH THE FARMERS THEMSELVES AND THEIR FAMILIES. THERE ARE A TOTAL OF 20 FARM COTTAGES, MOST OF THEM TIED COTTAGES. FIVE FARMS ARE ON MAIN WATER SUPPLY,ONE HAS ITS OWN BOREHOLE,1 HAS A SPRING AND 3 HAVE WELLS. ALL HAVE ELECTRICITY BUT NONE HAVE MAINS SEWERAGE.ALL HAVE INDIVIDUAL SEPTIC TANK DRAINAGE.MOST OF THE FARMS HAVE BEEN OWNED BY THE SAME FAMILY FOR SEVERAL GENERATIONS. ALL ARE PRIVATELY OWNED.
